text:
Mock exams setting students to fail.  Beware of PGI. 0 questions relating to personal property on mock exams.

Actual exams had like 10 questions about packaged household and other personal property questions. Beware.

I have been talking since more than 2 years to the helping desk lady Ms Rashidah. She is very polite and gentle lady and always makes sure to get the query solved. Her voice is very encouraging and gives positive vibes.
Scammers set you up to fail so u gotta pay to retake the exams. Most of the mock exam questions will not appear in the real exam

1July24 Today's exam was terrible! It didn't resemble the mock exams at all. There was no network in the classroom, so I couldn't access my IC on Singpass. I almost got rejected by the rude staff at the counter, who continued to harass me after the exam as I was leaving, reminding me to bring my physical pink IC. Sigh...

I achieved a score of 99.4% on the mock exam, but only 34% on the actual terminal exam today. I'm worried about the discrepancies in the scoring. It's frustrating that the mock exams seem designed for students to fail. I am concerned that the system is monopolized and that there may be unfair practices in place. Sigh ðŸ¥²

Hi there,

I would like to extend my gratitude to your staff who is front counter lady by the name (Shu). She is so helpful from the first day I attempt to the exam.

Iâ€™m not from insurance background, but on my 6th attempted i passed the exam. She help me through this time by giving me moral support and she was very empathy.

She guide me so well when i canâ€™t get into exam hall because of my ID issues. She went beyond then her service.

I hope this email will give her some recognitions for her service. Good job Shu! And BIG THANK YOU!!

Thank you!

Regards,

Zuhura Abu Bakar
